image1.alt: Outer Banks Construction Company - Sunrise Construction Team

title: Outer Banks Construction Experts - Full-Service Coastal Builders
subtitle: Premier OBX Construction Company
text: Sunrise Construction is the Outer Banks' most trusted construction company, specializing in hurricane-resistant coastal homes and beachfront construction. We successfully plan and manage complex OBX construction projects, providing long-term guarantees and mastering cutting-edge coastal building technologies. Our portfolio includes dozens of successfully completed hurricane-resistant homes and beachfront renovations across the Outer Banks, with exceptional quality that withstands coastal weather. Beachfront home repair and coastal construction is what we do best!

signature.alt: Zachary Wayland Signature - Director of Sunrise Construction OBX

name: Zachary Wayland
role: Director of Sunrise Construction - Outer Banks
